tag_list: cambridge, iphone, entrepreneur, france, silicon-valley, sciences-po
overview:
Emmanuel Carraud is Co-Founder and CEO of MagicSolver.com Ltd.

MagicSolver is a Cambridge based startup winner of Cambridge University Entrepreneurs Prize in June 2009. MagicSolver develops innovative iPhone applications and brings magic to your mobile phone with over 2,000,000 customers across 90 countries. Sudoku Magic, FaceShift, Advent Calendar and World Cup Calendar 2010 are among MagicSolver main successes. MagicSolver help also other companies to develop and promote their iPhone apps www.magicsolver.com Emmanuel has a Master degree in Economics and Marketing from Sciences Po Paris and an MBA from Judge Business School, Cambridge University. Fluent in French, Spanish and English, Emmanuel has ten years experience in marketing and project management for Danone, Nielsen and Auchan across Europe. Young Entrepreneur, he would like to share his passion and bring some magic to everyoneâ€™s life.
